core.critic

core.critic#

The critic module contains the critic class as well as the critic network.

The Critic acts as a wrapper around the actual critic Q-function to provide distributed training support and loading utilities.

CriticNetwork is a vanilla deep state-action network implementation.

class mp_rl.core.critic.Critic(size_s: int, size_a: int, nlayers: int, layer_width: int, lr: float, grad_clip: float = inf)#

Critic class encapsulating the critic and training process for the DDPG critic.

target(states: torch.Tensor, actions: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor#

Compute the action value with the target network.

Parameters

  • states – Input states.

  • actions – Input actions.

Returns

An action value tensor.

backward_step(loss: None._VariableFunctionsClass.tensor)#

Perform a backward pass with an optimizer step.

Parameters

loss – Critic network loss.

update_target(tau: float)#

Update the target network with a soft parameter transfer update.

Parameters

tau – Averaging fraction of the parameter update for the action network.

init_dist()#

Synchronize the critic network across MPI workers and reload the target network.

load(path: pathlib.Path)#

Load saved network weights for the critic and take care of syncronizations.

Parameters

path – Path to the saved state dict.

class mp_rl.core.critic.CriticNetwork(size_s: int, size_a: int, nlayers: int, layer_width: int)#

State action critic network for the critic.

forward(state: torch.Tensor, action: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor#

Compute the network forward pass.

Parameters

  • state – Input state tensor.

  • action – Input action tensor.

Returns

The network output.
